item.title: Data Visualization with R - Histogram
item.description: Introduction This is the seventh post in the series Data Visualization With R. In the previous post, we learnt about box and whisker plots. In this post, we will learn to: create a bare bones histogram specify the number of bins/intervals represent frequency density on the Y axis add colors to the bars and the border add labels to the bars A histogram is a plot that can be used to examine the shape and spread of continuous data.
